snippet: Brendan Canning, a founder of the Canadian musical collective Broken Social Scene, will be the D.J. at a Memorial Day weekend dance party that is part of the opening of a summer-long exhibition called "Oh, Canada."
abstract: Brendan Canning, a founder of the Canadian musical collective Broken Social Scene, will be the D.J. at a Memorial Day weekend dance party that is part of the opening of a summer-long exhibition called "Oh, Canada."

headline.main: Canadian D.J. to Kick Off a Summer of Canadian Art at Mass MoCA
